dcterms:creator: G. B. Moody
R. G. Mark
dcterms:description: The MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Dataset is a collection of ECG recordings used for the analysis and classification of arrhythmias. It provides labeled segments of ECG data to facilitate the development and evaluation of algorithms for arrhythmia detection.
dcterms:title: MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. B. Moody
R. G. Mark
dcterms:description: The MIT-BIH Atrial Fibrillation Dataset contains ECG recordings specifically focused on detecting atrial fibrillation. It includes labeled segments that help in the classification of AFIB and non-AFIB rhythms.
dcterms:title: MIT-BIH Atrial Fibrillation Dataset
